sentences.en: A depth sampler is strapped to the running board of the helicopter.
sentences.cn: 把深水取样器固定在直升机的试验台上.

sentences.en: Complimentary sampler of our new cream with any $ 25 purchase.
sentences.cn: 买满25元就可以获赠面霜免费试用装.

sentences.en: Fixed loop and variable volume devices operated manually or by an auto - sampler are used.
sentences.cn: 使用固定环,手动的可变容积装置,或自动取样器.

sentences.en: Hammer dredge is a technical improvement of the existing dredge sampler.
sentences.cn: 摘要重锤式拖网取样器是对现行常规拖网的技术改进.

sentences.en: Introduce the sampler in the liquid until sampling depth.
sentences.cn: 将取样器放入液体直到要求的取样深度.

sentences.en: It is an ideal equipment to replace the old sampler.
sentences.cn: 该机是替代老式取样机的理想设备.

sentences.en: On Wednesday, it was a sampler. She says the stripling's fun.
sentences.cn: 星期三, 要做样本拼布. 她说弯曲压线技巧很有趣.

sentences.en: Sampler: The sample chamber is defined by sustomer.
sentences.cn: 取样器的取样盒尺寸由用户决定.

sentences.en: Soil is sampled with a core sampler.
sentences.cn: 土壤的采样使用芯形采样器.

sentences.en: The present invention provides a sampler for investigating the homoptera insect.
sentences.cn: 本发明提供一种同翅目昆虫调查取样器.

sentences.en: The upper surface of the sampler body is provided with a plurality of water outlets.
sentences.cn: 在采样器体的上表面设有多个排水口.

sentences.en: This sampler can be used only in streams shallow enough to be waded.
sentences.cn: 这种取样器只能用在能涉渡的浅水河流上.

sentences.en: This sampling system is composed a sampler and sample collection receptacle.
sentences.cn: 采样系统由取样器、收集器和样品管道组成.

sentences.en: To take samples that retain the larger structure of the sediment, a core sampler is used.
sentences.cn: 为了保持样品沉积物的层次结构, 就要用空心铁管采样器.

sentences.en: Use'sampler'which has its own player and volume control.
sentences.cn: 使用'样品'有自己的播放器和音量控制.

words.tran_cn: 试样的，样品的；作为例子的
[自]采样器；取样器；样品检查员

trans.tran_cn: 采样器，样板，样品检查员
trans.tran_en: a piece of cloth with different stitches on it, made to show how good someone is at sewing
